Synopsis: Set primary email visibility for the authenticated user
Description: Sets the visibility for your primary email addresses.
Notes: [Set primary email visibility for the authenticated user](https://docs.github.com/rest/users/emails#set-primary-email-visibility-for-the-authenticated-user)

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Set-GitHubUserEmailVisibility -Visibility public
Sets the visibility for your primary email addresses to public.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Set-GitHubUserEmailVisibility -Visibility private
Sets the visibility for your primary email addresses to private.
